data.text: This hotel was very Good and had very Good service, specially a guy who is named Mohammed. I really recomend this place. Very clean all the place. The swimmingpool was very nice with a nice view. I would come here one more time as much as I liked it.
data.title: Good

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear marianasL2249FN,

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us as we strive to consistently exceed guest expectations in every way. Let me take this opportunity to thank you for choosing to stay at the First Collection Business Bay and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. I am happy to hear that you were impressed with the team’s friendly good services, specially Mohammed. Your comments regarding good services and swimming pool are a delight to read. 

We appreciate your recommendation and we do hope that we will be able to welcome you back soon. 

Warm regards,

Greg Moses 
Cluster Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Greg Moses

data.text: I stayed here on the 19/03/2024. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The room was immaculately clean and comfortable. Easy access to everything as taxis are always available outside the hotel. I am returning 31st may and can not wait
data.title: Amazing and peaceful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Chikaboo01,

Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that our team went above and beyond to make your stay special. We definitely look forward to welcoming you back very soon! Your kind words are truly appreciated, and we will make sure to pass on your compliments to the team. 

We look forward to welcoming you back to Dubai and of course to The First Collection Business Bay.

Warm regards,

Greg Moses
Cluster Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Greg Moses

data.text:
We’ve been on many hotels throughout the years, but this hotel has been one of the very best experiences we’ve had! The most amazing and helpful staff, that makes sure that you have the best time ever.

Especially a big thanks to Valentine, Richard and the rest of the staff, who gave us big smiles and an excellent service!

Thank you so much for this time. We look forward coming back!
data.title: Simply just amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear vic2riagammelgaardf,

I would like to thank you for the wonderful feedback you provided for us, and I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is through our guests’ feedback that we can improve and sustain our level of service. I am happy to hear that you were impressed with the team’s friendly good services, specially Valentine and Richard.

We look forward to welcoming you back to the First Collection Business Bay.

Warm regards,

Greg Moses
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Greg Moses

data.text: Very bad staff . No customer service valet guy Dan rude and valet service is very lazy.  And so many times  door man is not available this is my first and last stay .I am very sad about the hotel behavior......................................
data.title: Rude staff .

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for staying with us and thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay.
 We take our valued guests’ feedback seriously and I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your comments, I also appreciate the candid feedback we receive regarding our valet service and doorman and welcome any opportunity to improve.

Rest assured that the report matter is not an indicator of our high standard, I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may cause and I hope you give us another chance to display our true standard of service.

Sincerely,

Greg Moses
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Greg Moses

data.text: I have to say that Laxman is the best  life guard at the first class collection business bay hotel. He’s always looking for everyone’s safety  and the pool looked always clean during the day and the next morning.  I can highly recommend him as a life guard! Thank you Laxman.
data.title: Laxman - life guard

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lea,

Thank you for the lovely feedback you have given us, and we are happy that you enjoyed our facilities and services, I will share your wonderful words with the lifeguard Laxman and I am glad that he was able to delight you with his genuine service.

We appreciate your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Dubai and of course to The First Collection Business Bay.

Warm regards,

Greg Moses
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Greg Moses
